label: 国府
本: Capital and Countryside in Japan, 300-1180:  Japanese Historians Interpreted in English . Cornell University East Asia Program . 2006
説明文: provincial headquarters, the center of provincial administration in a province. Its precincts housed the administrative offices and manufacturing shops overseen by the provincial governor (kokushi), his residence and those of his staff from the capital, including those occupied by resident provincial officials (zaichô kanjin 在庁官人) from mid-Heian times. [国司]
